version_description:
- Improve the stability
- Bug fix

1. 适配iPad，现在你可以在iPad上使用SSR功能
2. 新增SS线路，VIP用户可享受更多高速SS线路选择
3. 新增线路延迟测试功能，可实时看到每条线路的网络延迟
4. 修复部分bug，连接更稳定
========================================
1. Adaptive iPad, now you can use SSR function on iPad.
2. Add SS line, VIP users can enjoy more high-speed SS line selection.
3. Add the function of line delay test to see the network delay of each line in real time.
4. Fixed some bugs and made the connection more stable.
Fix some bugs

1. Fix some crash bugs.
2. Improve stability.

If you have any questions, please contact us:
supershadowsocks@gmail.com

1. Improving ui and fix some bugs.
2. Improve stability.

If you have any questions, please contact us:
supershadowsocks@gmail.com

1. 添加Widget今日挂件，一键快速启动vpn，更加迅速方便！
2. 完善UI细节并修复部分bug

If you have any questions, please contact us:
supershadowsocks@gmail.com

修复Widget "无法载入" 问题
修复IP有时显示空白问题

Fix widget "Unable to load" bug

If you have any questions, please contact us:
supershadowsocks@gmail.com

1. 完善二维码扫描稳定性。
2. 优化连接速度。
3. 优化Widget今日挂件加载时间。
4. 校正流量统计以及网速测试准确性。

If you have any questions, please contact us:
supershadowsocks@gmail.com

1. Improved connection stability
2. fix bugs

优化了ss连接速度，提升today widget插件稳定性
修复一些bug

1. 全新UI页面设计，更简洁
2. 全面升级CN2 SS线路
3. 提供多条免费服务器线路
4. 稳定性提升

1. New UI page design, more concise
2. Comprehensively upgrade cn2 server
3. Provide multiple free server
4. Stability improvement

1.VIP全面升级为CN2 SS线路
2.新增多条免费服务器线路
3.稳定性提升，修复部分bug

1. Comprehensively upgrade cn2 server
2. Provide multiple free server
3. Stability improvement, fix bug

1.新增多条CN2 GIA线路
2.新增多条免费服务器线路
3.稳定性提升，修复部分bug，适配iPad

1. Added multiple CN2 server
2. Provide multiple free server
3. Stability improvement, fix bug, adaptive iPad

1. 优化列表页面UI，部分机型适配
2. widget稳定性优化，修复部分bug
3. 全线升级线路，不用担心ip失效，支持自动检测推荐

1. Optimize the UI of the list page, and adapt some models
2. Widget stability optimization to fix some bugs
3. Upgrade the vip server, add IP automatic detection recommendation

优化IKEv2模式连接速度
优化SS线路
修复部分bug

1. 支持新的SS加密方式aes-256-gcm，bf-cfb，aes-256-ctr，chacha20-ietf-poly1305，xchacha20-ietf-poly1305
2. 新增Shadowsocks服务器线路以及IKEv2服务器线路
3. 修复二维码扫描bug
4. 稳定性提升

1. Support new SS encryption methods: AES-256-GCM, BF-CFB, AES-256-CTR, Chacha20-IETF - Poly1305, Xchacha20-IETF - Poly1305
2. Add Shadowsocks server line and IKEv2 server line
3. Fix the BUG of QR code scanning
4. Improved stability

1. 适配 iOS 14
2. 新增支持V2ray, VMess 协议
3. 新增支持Shadowsocks混淆模式Obfs
4. 新增支持aes-128-gcm, aes-256-gcm, chacha20-ietf, chacha20-ietf-poly1305 等等加密方式
5. 新增支持UDP数据转发
6. 修复部分bug, 二维码扫描逻辑完善

1. Fix iOS 14
2. Added support for V2ray and VMess protocol
3. Added support for Shadowsocks Obfs
4. New support for ENCRYPTION methods such as AES-128-GCM, AES-256-GCM, Chacha20-IETF, Chacha20-IETF-poly1305, etc
5. Added support for UDP data forwarding
6. Fixed some bugs

1. 新增支持Trojan协议
2. 新增支持V2ray + WebSocket + TLS模式
3. 新增支持添加服务器订阅URL(ss + V2ray + trojan)
4. 修复V2ray协议连接Bug
5. 修复关闭代理时卡顿bug
6. 修复V2ray(Vmess) 二维码扫描无法识别WS-Path路径bug
7. UI优化

1. Added support for Trojan protocol
2. Support V2Ray + WebSocket + TLS mode
3. Added support to add server subscription URL(SS + V2Ray + Trojan)
4. Fix V2Ray protocol connection Bug
5. Fix the lag bug when closing the agent
6. Fix V2Ray (Vmess) QR code scanning can't identify WS-Path Path bug
7. The UI optimization

5. 修复关闭代理时卡顿bug
6. 修复V2ray(Vmess) 二维码扫描无法识别WS-Path路径bug
7. UI优化以及修复部分bug
